Class ReviewWindow

java.lang.Object
application.ReviewWindow
public class ReviewWindow extends Object
This class handles the Review Window functionality, including displaying, creating, updating, and deleting reviews, as well as marking reviewers as trusted and voting on reviews. It provides a UI interface for all review-related operations and manages interactions with the database through helper classes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
ApplicationTeam

  • Constructor Details

    • ReviewWindow

      public ReviewWindow(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Review> allReviews, Map<Review,Integer> reviewIDs, DatabaseHelper databaseHelper, User currentUser)
      Constructor for ReviewWindow which initializes the review management interface.
      Parameters:
      allReviews - ObservableList of all reviews in the system
      reviewIDs - Map of reviews to their database IDs
      databaseHelper - Database connection helper for general operations
      currentUser - Current logged in user

  • Method Details

    • setPrimaryStage

      public void setPrimaryStage(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Sets the primary stage for navigation purposes. This allows the review window to navigate back to the main application.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The main application stage

    • showReviewWindow

      public void showReviewWindow(int answerID)
      Displays the review window for a specific answer showing all associated reviews. Creates a new stage if one doesn't exist, or brings an existing one to the front. The window includes functionality for creating, updating, and deleting reviews, as well as marking reviewers as trusted and voting on reviews.
      Parameters:
      answerID - The ID of the answer to show reviews for

    • handleReviewVote

      private void handleReviewVote(Review review, int reviewId, String voteType)
      Handles the vote action for a review including database updates and UI refresh. Manages different vote scenarios: new votes, changing votes, or removing votes.
      Parameters:
      review - The review being voted on
      reviewId - The ID of the review in the database
      voteType - The type of vote ("upvote" or "downvote")

    • openDirectMessageWith

      private void openDirectMessageWith(String reviewerUsername)
      Opens the Direct Message window to start a conversation with a specific reviewer. Navigates to the Direct Message page and initializes a chat session.
      Parameters:
      reviewerUsername - The username of the reviewer to message

    • promptForNewReview

      private void promptForNewReview(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Review> reviewListView, int answerID)
      Prompts the user to enter a new review for an answer. Validates the review text and saves it to the database if valid.
      Parameters:
      reviewListView - The list view to update with the new review
      answerID - The ID of the answer being reviewed

    • promptForUpdatedReview

      private void promptForUpdatedReview(javafx.scene.control.ListView<Review> reviewListView, Review review)
      Prompts the user to update an existing review. Validates the updated text and saves to the database if valid.
      Parameters:
      reviewListView - The list view to refresh after update
      review - The review to update

    • showErrorMessage

      private void showErrorMessage(String title, String content)
      Displays an error message dialog with the specified title and content.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the error message dialog
      content - The content of the error message dialog
